data.label: Hero Headline
data.content: Your design engineering hobbit, collecting new coordinates.

data.label: Bio - Intro
data.content: Much software is architecturally vast yet operationally incoherent, offering only the illusion of solvency. I strive to translate complex systems into beautiful interactions.

data.label: Bio - Current Work
data.content: I'm currently building {Student Machine Lab|https://studentmachines.com}, where we craft delightful AI interfaces for local LLMs.

data.label: Bio - Mobbin
data.content: Doing fun experiments at {Mobbin|https://mobbin.com} as a growth engineer, previously led a national campaign for {Perplexity}.

data.label: Bio - Han River
data.content: I was the sole analyst at {Han River Partners|https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20241022128248/en/HRZ-Han-River-Launches-%24100-Million-Venture-Fund-to-Fuel-Korea-Graph-Tech-Startups}, working under Chris Koh, co-founder of {Coupang (NYSE: CPNG)}.

data.label: Bio - Grants
data.content: Through sheer dumb luck, I was the first Korean to receive grants from the teams at {Neo|https://www.forbes.com/sites/richardnieva/2025/04/16/this-tech-incubator-is-harder-to-get-into-than-harvard/} and {1517 Fund|https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2016-12-01/thiel-s-1517-fund-is-stalking-the-next-zuckerberg}.
